original_title: 失楽妻 抑えきれない愛欲
overview: Eri, who has been married for three years, is spending boring days with her husband who is busy with work. One day, Eri is reunited with her old male friend Inoue, triggered by her friend Hitomi. Inoue tries to approach Eri with her feelings for Eri, which he was unable to convey due to circumstances, and Eri's jealousy towards her husband, but...
title: The Cursed Wife. Uncontrollable Lust. Kana Morisawa
